name: Swipe Bo puzzle for iPad
description:
Fresh and cute puzzle with eye-catching graphics and intuitive game-play. Challenge for everyone who enjoys puzzles and is looking for great variety.

"Get all keys to open portal and move on next level" - you didn't think it was gonna be that easy, did you? Game starts simply and progress to levels that requires your brain power.

During the game you became introduced with new elements, which make game more and more challenging and entertaining.

GAME HIGHLIGHTS
• 2 level packs featuring 80 unique exciting levels
• Intuitive game-play
• Eye-catching graphics
• Game Center support
• Interactive game-play elements: portals, forwarders, sliding blocks and much more...
• Hours of fun and challenge

Don't miss your chance to PLAY this exciting game - we promise you will LIKE IT!
